pages.text: O-Farm Goats drop chevon, goat horns and wool, and can be milked for goat milk. Farm Goats are tamed with Copper, and can be bred/ healed with any normal Goat food. They can carry chests and follow their owner while doing so, along with being able to climb up to 2 blocks vertically. Multiple Goats can be put into a caravan, like Llamas.

O-Farm Goats come in multiple different breeds. These include: $(br2)-(0) Classic $(br)-(1) Meat $(br)-(2) Nubian $(br)-(3) Warm $(br)-(4) Fibrous $(br)-(5) Dairy $(br)Most goats drop leather, but only Fibrous goats can be shorn or killed for wool.
